mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freereply (freplyno, freplycontent, freplyname, freplydate, freplygrpno, freplyindent, freplyansnum, freeno, memberno, seqno) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(freplyno), 0)+1 as freplyno FROM freereply), #{freplycontent}, #{freplyname}, sysdate, (SELECT NVL(MAX(freplygrpno), 0)+1 as freplygrpno FROM freereply), 0, 0, #{freeno}, #{memberno}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT freplyno, freplycontent, freplyname, freplydate, freplygrpno, freplyindent, freplyansnum, freeno, memberno, seqno FROM freereply WHERE freplyno = #{freplyno} ORDER BY freplyno ASC
